title: Neville Mendham: agronomist
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Joe Scully
brief_description: The territory of Papua New Guinea offers many opportunities for technicians in all branches of science. In this film, the first of a series to be made about this general subject, the man studied is a agronomist working in a developing society and a land of great promise, on a project to develop an oil palm industry.
